subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant scored 30 of his 52 points in the fourth quarter and overtime Sunday to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a 108-104 victory against the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Kobe Bryant scored 30 of his 52 points in the fourth quarter and overtime Sunday to lead the Los Angeles Lakers to a 108-104 victory against the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
